DescribeDedicatedClusterHosts.document: This example shows you how to query host information of the CDC
DescribeDedicatedClusterHosts.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cdc.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeDedicatedClusterHosts
<Common request parameters>

{
    "DedicatedClusterId": "cluster-nk6e8j6c"
}
DescribeDedicatedClusterHosts.title: Querying host information of the CDC

DescribeDedicatedClusterTypes.document: This example shows you how to query the CDC order configuration list.
DescribeDedicatedClusterTypes.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cdc.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeDedicatedClusterTypes
<Common request parameters>

{
    "Name": "abc",
    "DedicatedClusterTypeIds": [
        "abc"
    ],
    "Offset": 0,
    "Limit": 10,
    "IsCompute": true
}
DescribeDedicatedClusterTypes.output:
{

            },
            {

            },
            {
